fields.text: Thank you for calling ReferralExchange, headquartered in San Francisco and serving REALTOR® professionals with referrals nationwide.
If you are calling to submit a client referral, press [INDEX].
To submit a new referral, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a ReferralExchange submission specialist.
To check the status of a referral submission, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve the status of your referral submission.
If you are calling to request a referral lead, press [INDEX].
To request new referral leads, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a ReferralExchange referral request specialist.
To check the status of your referral requests, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we check the status of your referral requests.
